name: Manoir Des Arts Hotel
address: 64 Dien Bien Phu street, Hong Bang district, Thành phố Hải Phòng, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Thành phố Hải Phòng, cách Nhà hát lớn Hải Phòng 7 phút đi bộ, Manoir Des Arts Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có hồ bơi ngoài trời, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, khu vườn và sân hiên. Chỗ nghỉ này có quầy bar, cũng như nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực Á. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Manoir Des Arts Hotel, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Hằng ngày, chỗ nghỉ có các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Mỹ cho bữa sáng.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Trung tâm thương mại Vincom Ngô Quyền 14 phút đi bộ và Cảng Tuần Châu 43 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách Manoir Des Arts Hotel 8 km.

review.comment_positive:
Très bel hôtel , très bien tenu ,personnel à la hauteur.Par moments on se croirait au RAFFLES de Singapour toutes proportions gardées.
Belle chambre spacieuse et confortable.
Hall très agréable et cosy.
Superbe bar avec piano et ambiance très feutrée.
Bon petit déjeuner buffet un peu répétitif..
Bien situé, nombreux restaurants dans la zone.
review.comment_negative: Les prix au bar trop élevés .

review.rating: Prima verblijf midden in de stad.
review.comment_positive:
De suite was mooi ruim en het meubilair in de suite was goed.
De suite was schoon.
review.comment_negative:
De douche was vrij klein. Ik.miste een bad.
De douchekop was kapot, kwam bijna geen water uit.

review.comment_positive: Son style colonial, bon restaurant et petit déjeuner . Bon emplacement

review.comment_positive: Tout: personnel, accueil, chambre,...

review.comment_positive:
Khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện. Sẽ quay lại vào dịp sau.
100% recommend

The hotel is located next to the museum and near many good local restaurants. The room was nice and clean. When knowing we came for a food tour, the staff gave us a 2 A4 long list to try and carefully showed us the way to get there. They also let us check in early.

review.comment_positive: Vị trí thuận tiện đi lại

review.rating: Good location but lacking other areas
review.comment_positive: Location and friendly staff
review.comment_negative:
Property was old and maintenance required, breakfast was simple, cereal was old, there was cockroaches in our bedroom and bath area. 
Staff checked us in with group 11 people including children and told on last day we were given an extra day and had to pay due to staff error. I was not happy especially when booking paper was provided and then extra charges for water and basic amenities.

Breakfast needs to be better as it was quite basic and when I asked staff spoke little English and didn’t make an effort to accomodate.

review.comment_positive: The staff were friendly and really tried to help although some of the services were slow.
review.comment_negative: Two bedroom place has no dividing door between.

review.rating: had a great stay there. the restaurant is very good and others are close. thanks!

review.comment_positive: the location is great. You can walk to the centre in only 5 mins

Location is not desirable, only one coffee house nearby, no convenience store but base on the price has nothing much to complain
Dusty hotel, noisy street, police bother you at midnight.

review.rating: We very much enjoyed our stay at Manoir des Arts, especially due to the very friendly and helpful staff!
review.comment_positive: This was a classic property in the grand French style, located centrally.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, food and drinks were excellent!
review.comment_negative: There was no side table on one side of the bed, but we moved a table from the sitting area to make it work.

review.rating: great hotel in the middle of Hai Phong, convenient location, friendly English speaking staff
review.comment_positive:
We really enjoyed our stay. Qhyn and Thomas were really nice and helpful with our questions. Thomas speaks perfect English and helped with all our requests. we felt welcome and had a pleasant night. great beds.
breakfast could be improved: large selection but only medium taste.
didnt try the restaurant but seemed a bit pricey for Vietnam standards. however lots of restaurants and food stalls, beer and coffee places in walking distance.
we recommend and would stay here again for sure!

again: best reception staff!
review.comment_negative: as written, we have had tastier breakfast in Vietnam, specially regarding Vietnamese dishes such as the fried rice and noodles. but this is only a minor point.

review.rating: Wonderful experience at a beautiful hotel. Superb service and rooms. Highly recommended.
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful property and extremely well appointed and comfortable rooms. Excellent staff - helpful, pleasant, and always smiling. Special thanks to the manager for helping me organise the Ha Long Bay tour from an agency I found online, he was happy to communicate with them and confirm the tour. 
Lovely breakfast options, almost too many. Great restaurant setting for breakfast too. Good location close to eateries and cafes.
review.comment_negative: I struggled with keeping a stable WiFi connection in my room that was towards the front of the property. The speeds were fluctuating and it would often disconnect. Made it virtually impossible to have my work call go smoothly. I brought this to the attention of the front desk, so hopefully remedial measures will be taken.

review.rating: Really nice place. We stayed 1 night.
review.comment_positive: Style
review.comment_negative: AC noisy

review.comment_positive: Great location, cafe, swimming pool. Great staff too
review.comment_negative: Rooms need updating, especially shower.

review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: All was nice!

review.comment_positive: The staff were super friendly and the property is so so beautiful, we had an incredible time!
phục vụ, không gian
review.comment_negative: thang máy hơi nhỏ

review.comment_positive:
Very friendly helpful staff. Particular thanks to the concierge who was very patient with me as the safe in the hotel was not easy to use. 
The hotel was clean. The beds were comfortable. We used this hotel as a stop off before catching the ferry to Cat Ba in the morning. It's only a short walk to the ferry terminal. 
Excellent would highly recommend.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: Sạch sẽ, phục vụ tốt
review.comment_negative: Không có.

review.comment_positive: Location and staff.

Service orentated staff, nice hotel, good location, close to airport and also in a walking distance from city center.
Caffee bar, good breakfast.
200 MBPs internet speed !

We have been travelling Thailand and Vietnam for 3.5 weeks and have stayed in lovely hotels but this was by far the most exceptional. it’s a beautiful place, decor really nice. Everything spotlessly clean. Staff absolutely exceptional. From Porter to receptionists to bar staff, restaurant staff and manager. We were looked after so well-a genuine warmth in everyone working here. We had the most delicious meal in the restaurant-it is expensive relatively speaking in Vietnam but it was so worth the extra money spent. it was haute cuisine. I could not recommend this hotel highly enough. We do hope to come back to Vietnam and we would make a trip to Haiphong just to stay here.
review.comment_negative: Absolutely nothing.

review.comment_positive: French style renovation & decoration.

Bathroom black floor tiles losing shine resulting in dirty dull appearance. Lighting in shower area to be improved. Emergency green exit sign was blocked by beam at lift area, not visible from room door area.

review.comment_positive: Vị trí trung tâm, không gian đẹp

review.rating: 整體上還可以，如果避免上述事件發生會更佳
review.comment_positive: 夜間留守的禮賓接待員，依然熱心按客人需求提供協助
review.comment_negative: 櫃檯服務人員重複刷卡、導致二次付款，對客戶當下立即反應對付款有疑問，不明白為何經查詢仍告知只有一次付款，事後由客戶自行向銀行確認有兩次相同金額的付款成立、再要求飯店櫃檯人員進行退款，對此飯店方僅表示口頭道歉，期間過於被動。

review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpfull staff, nice hotel with big, comfortable rooms.
review.comment_negative: Windows not well insulated. Construction site in the garden.
Phòng tiếp giáp với máy thông hơi, nên rất ồn k thể ngủ được.

review.comment_positive: 아침식사가 조금은 다양한 음식이 필요 합니다.

review.rating: Overall it was a pleasant stay.
review.comment_positive: The dining room was beautiful, and we enjoyed our first dinner and the daily breakfast there.  The buffet breakfast was good, and we loved the made-to-order omelet.  The two ladies working at the hotel front desk are super helpful.  They helped us purchase train tickets to Hanoi, change money, hire a taxi for a city tour, and go to the train station. There are few people speaking English in Hai Phong. All the signs are in Vietnamese only.  Luckily, we were taken good care of by the hotel staff and had a wonderful time in Hai Phong.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive:
Gentillesse du personnel.
Emplacement super.
Petit déjeuner copieux et varié.
Option Excursion Baie d'Halong
review.comment_negative: Quelques odeurs dans la salle de bain.

review.rating: A good choice in the area.
review.comment_positive: Wonderful staff, very welcoming.

review.comment_positive: Staff were friendly and helpful, the location was good and breakfast was lovely.

Bathroom could do with being updated.
I asked for complimentary water to be sent to the room and upon check out was charged for it. They did not make this clear.

review.rating: Nice and comfortable hotel perfect for exploring Hai Phong
review.comment_positive: The location was very good and found the all the staff very helpful - especially the night supervisor / night team and morning reception team. The rooms and bed were comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Soundproofing of rooms, but I think we got unlucky with an exceptionally loud neighbour. Would have liked to use sun loungers by pool, however they are too public to the cafe (maybe move to upper level for more privacy?)

review.rating: it’s a three star hotel trying to be more

review.comment_negative: some things are placed nonsensically, the safe in the closet, gets in the way of putting your luggage down. Shower doesn’t drain quickly enough, water hose for the toilet pressure is really really high.

The bathroom was very mouldy all over the floor and around the corners, poor quality amenities.
Breakfast was terrible, the food was only suitable for Chinese guests, everything was cold and empty, we had to ask for water twice during our breakfast, the water container looked yellow and dirty. Staffs didn’t speak English except the receptionist.

review.comment_negative: Parking place and parking staff was a mess

review.rating: Great stay, clean hotel, service minded personel. Great value for money!
review.comment_positive:
Great breakfast , nice coffee, very polite and frendly personal; nice clean airconditioned rooms.
Defeniely worth to return back and choose the same hotel again!
Der Service im Hotel war hervorragend. Besonders Van Anh ist hervorzuheben, da sie alles in ihrer Macht getan hat um unseren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten.
review.comment_negative:
Es war sehr dreckig, wir hatten fremde Haare im Bett. Das Badezimmer ist runtergekommen und dreckig. 
Schlafen ist in dem Bett und bei der Lautstärke (9 Klimaanlagen vor dem Fenster) nicht möglich.
Im gesamten Flur sinkt es nach Zigaretten und da die Tür einen Finger großen Spalt aufweist das Zimmer genau so. 
Alles in allem auf keinen Fall zu empfehlen.

review.comment_positive: tuyệt hảo
Nice clean rooms in a great location
review.comment_negative: Premium room could be improved by adding a door between the two rooms.

review.rating: a very comfortable stay, made better by exceptional staff
review.comment_positive: the staff were amazing. particular praise to Thomas, who helped us book a halong bay cruise at short notice. he also helped with a misunderstanding with the taxi driver the day after we had checked out. very pleased.
Nhân viên ở đây vô cùng thân thiện, tận tình và chuyên nghiệp. Khách sạn sạch sẽ, đẹp, địa điểm rất tiện để thăm thú các nơi và ăn uống, có spa ngay cạnh KS, lại còn cạnh bảo tàng Hải phòng nữa!
review.comment_negative: KS nên nhắc nhở khách đặc biệt là trẻ em, không làm ồn và nghịch ngợm ở lobby và cửa vào vì như vậy làm phiền các khách khác và có thể nguy hiểm cho các bé do kẹt cửa.

review.comment_positive: Beautiful building, fantastic restaurant, delightful live acoustic music, next to museum, great room, great food!
review.comment_negative: Staff seemed not to know much about the area

review.rating: Cảm giác rất tồi tệ và bức xúc.!
review.comment_positive: vị trí trung tâm
review.comment_negative: thái độ nhân viên rất tệ. Giờ check out là 12h trưa. Tôi đi công việc đến 11.50 về tới khách sạn thấy con mình đã vị đuổi ra khỏi phòng và đang ngồi trông hành lý dưới sảnh để chờ mẹ.( con gái tôi mới 13 tuổi). Hỏi nhân viên lễ tân: Tại sao chưa đến giờ check out mà dám đuổi con chị xuống sảnh ngồi? nếu giả sử c về muộn vì lý do bất khả kháng thì ks tính thêm tiền phòng chứ tại sao đuổi cháu xuống đây ngồi? Lễ tân ko trả lời được nên chỉ bảo là: Vậy e đưa lại chìa khoá cho chị lên phòng lại. Lúc đứng nói chuyện tại lễ tân cũng mới chỉ 11.55’.

review.comment_positive: Goed hotel, centraal gelegen met vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel.
review.comment_negative: De airco werkte niet zo goed.

review.rating: Kì nghỉ ok. Khách sạn ngay trung tâm nên tiện lợi cho đi lại. Đường lớn nên thoải mái
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện đặc biệt anh hỗ trợ hành lý cho khách. Lúc nào cũng tươi cười và hướng dẫn địa điểm ăn uống.
review.comment_negative: Thiếu bàn trang điểm và gương trang điểm. Nên kiểm tra và nâng cấp thêm phòng. Với giá 1 triệu 2/1 đêm thì giường hơi cứng nhẹ. Chắc do tuỳ thoái quen. Giá hơi cao nhưng ngay trung tâm thì tạm ok.

review.comment_positive: The room was very quiet and comfortable with lovely high ceilings. It was at the back and facing the pool area which kept the street noise down. In-room furniture was very comfortable. It’s a well renovated 1940’s hotel with a vintage design theme.
review.comment_negative: We understand it’s the low time of year with few guests, but the breakfast buffet was quite random. One day average, one day no buffet???, one day excellent. Service was also hit and miss. We had examples of good service, but more often service was disinterested or distracted.

review.rating: Ambiance d'un autre temps entouré d'un personnel à l'exceptionnelle gentillesse
review.comment_positive:
En premier, la gentillesse de l'ensemble du personnel, ensuite, l'excellence du restaurant avec calme et vue jardin, 
l'hôtel est bien situé et les chambres ont une bonne isolation phonique.
Un hôtel où il fait bon vivre dans l'ambiance surannée des palaces d'antan.
Vivement recommandé
Khách sạn đẹp, nhân viên chuyên nghiệp
review.comment_negative: Đồ ăn sáng quá ít

review.comment_positive: Very friendly people, they work hard to please the guest.
review.comment_negative: tv was crazy

review.comment_positive: nhân viên dễ chịu
review.comment_negative: hơi ồn. cách âm kém

review.comment_positive: Everything's great and updated compare to the last time we were here. Definitely will stay again when we visit Haiphong

reviewer.name: David
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.comment_positive: Great. lovely room. great staff. great location.
review.comment_negative: breakfast could be better

review.comment_positive:
Nice location, close to the museum and a walking distance to the opera house. Very helpful staff, and a great breakfast/dinner.
The room was clean and stylish. 
Enjoyed my stay!

review.rating: Haus mit Stil, sehr zentral, 1A Service!
review.comment_positive: Service und Hilfsbereitschaft waren sehr gut! Frühstücksbüffet sehr reichhaltig, Pool im Außenbereich idyllisch. Sonst alles sauber und ordentlich. Die in den Bewertungen kritisierten Matratzen sind nachvollziehbar, uns persönlich hat es nicht gestört und wir haben sehr gut geschlafen!
review.comment_negative: Die Einrichtung ist etwas in die Jahre gekommen, das passt aber eigentlich zum Stil des Hauses. Gegebenenfalls könnte man die Matratzen mal langsam gegen neue ersetzen.

review.comment_positive: die zentrale Lage ist super, die Kathedrale, die Oper und das Museum sind zu Fuß zu erreichen. Die Ausstattung ist sehr geschmackvoll und gut ausgewählt.
review.comment_negative: Es gab nichts zu bemängeln.

review.comment_positive: các b lễ tân rất nhiệt tình. ra vào cũng có ng mở cửa choa không gian thì đỉnh lun đó. đi đúng dịp snhat đc khách sạn tặng bánh và hát chúc mừng luon bất ngờ thực sự ah🫣 hướng tới mục đích bảo vệ môi trường rất tốt. có loại nc mời lúc check in ngon dã man ấy. mình đã qlai lần 2 😆 lần sau sẽ thử trà chiều ở đây
review.comment_negative:
hơi tối mình vẫn muốn sáng hơn 
bữa sáng k đa dạng lắm k hợp mình
đièu hoà khong khí trong phòng rất bí.

review.rating: Đây là 1 địa điểm trải nghiệm thú vị trên hành trình du lịch của gia đình mình.
review.comment_positive: ở trung tâm thành phố, tiện di chuyển tới các địa điểm. Các bạn nhân viên giải quyết công việc rất chuyên nghiệp và chu đáo.
review.comment_negative: chất lượng phòng mình đánh già ở mức tạm ổn vì hơi bé và chất lượng đồ đạc cũng không quá mới. hệ thống điện ít và tối.

review.comment_positive: Nice staff.
review.comment_negative: Lighting. Poorly lit room.

review.comment_positive: Struttura accogliente, camera spaziosa e pulita. È stato bello passare una notte qui e riprendere le forze dopo un tour abbastanza wild nell’Hagiang Loop. Il personale ci ha atteso fino a tarda notte e sono stati molto disponibili!
Very nice service

review.comment_negative: 房间噪音太大（3楼）

review.comment_positive: Service from the staffs is amazing, they are very helpful and polite for every requests. Talking to them is very satisfied because of their good attitude and manners. I especially love food catering from the hotel. Every food that I tried during my stay was above expectation: yummy cake, delicious breakfast, etc...
review.comment_negative: Room is abit small and the hotel is quite old. I expected the hotel was big but then I was a little dissapointed about its capacity. Swimming pool is very small, suitable for kids and when I sat next to the pool, I got wet from water splashes.

review.comment_positive:
Very helpful reception staff went out of their way to accommodate. 
Gorgeous pool area. Loved the hotel bar and their high end speakers.
Best cocktails.
review.comment_negative:
Old bed creaked to every movement so sleep was hit and miss. 
Nothing to do with the hotel but crossing the street in Cat Bi is a risky business.

review.comment_positive: Le petit déjeuner continental, la propreté de la chambre, le confort, les équipements
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.comment_positive: location
review.comment_negative: breakfast

review.comment_positive:
The staff were really friendly and helpful. Location is great with everything in walking distance. The design is vintage in colonial style.
Great value for money
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast is boring.
The room is a bit small compared to what is presented on the pictures.

review.rating: Perfektes Hotel, angenehme Atmosphäre , höfliches Service, gutes Restaurant
review.comment_positive:
Sehr gutes Frühstück, professionelle Rezeption, besonders Ms. Le Van Anh hat uns sehr überzeugt: örtliche Auskunft, Tour, perfekte Gast-Betreuung mit Herz und Kompetenz. Höfliche Bell-boys, gutes Restaurant mit ordentlicher Küche und eigene Patisserie, nette Servicepersonal. 
Sehr sauberes Zimmer, saubere Dusche, bequemes Bett, kuschelige Decke.
Ausstattung nach europäischem Geschmack, angenehmes Licht im Zimmer sowie im Restaurant ( sogar mit schönem Musik)

Mình đã đi rất nhiều khách sạn nhưng chưa thấy nhân viên ở đâu ân cần và nhiệt tình như ở đây. Nam thanh nữ tú ăn mặc đẹp như Kingsman, nhóc nhà mình ngủ dậy bị dị ứng các bạn ấy hỏi han nhiệt tình rồi lấy khăn ấm chờm, trộm vía 1 lúc sau đỡ hẳn.

Phòng ốc đẹp, sạch sẽ thiết bị mới, sảnh lễ tân trang trí tinh tế nên check in rất bắt mắt, hàng tối thứ 7 còn có ca nhạc hát live
Vị trí trung tâm cách nhà hát 5 phút đi bộ, gần nhiều quán cafe (1986) và quán ăn

Đặc biệt ksan có rất nhiều góc chill để chụp ảnh, thiết kế phong cách châu âu với tông màu rất dễ chịu và hài hoà. Lần sau mình sẽ lại tiếp tục nghỉ ở ksan này vì rất ưng ý với sự phục vụ của các bạn nhân viên.

review.rating: A very nice hotel centrally-located in Haiphong
review.comment_positive:
We choose this hotel on location and price after studying previous guest's reviews - we were not disappointed as the hotel description on booking,com exactly matched reality, with everything shown on the website being presented to guests.

Our room was comfortable, with a high ceiling typical of the French colonial period. The room decoration was excellent, as was the bathroom with its modern and tasteful ambience. The standard of housekeeping was excellent - our room was always made-up on our return.

We were staying immediately after Tet had started so the hotel was not up to capacity. Depending on the number of guests each night, breakfast was either from their a le carte menu or a breakfast buffet - either choice was excellent with a range of foods from Asian to Western.

We only took breakfast in the hotel, preferring to eat out elsewhere in the evening. There were several restaurants nearby, but travellers should note that in the 10 days after Tet the majority were closed for the Tet period - this did not cause us any problems as the Thai restaurant located a mere 100 metres to the west of the hotel remained open throughout Tet.

We decided to use the hotel's travel desk to book a one-day cruise in Ha Long Bay (via their 7-hour VIP cruise utilising La Casta Cruises) - the hotel's arrangements and the cruise itself were excellent - a thoroughly enjoyable day out on a modern well-crewed and comfortable ship.
review.comment_negative: One minor criticism - the safety box was large with instructions for use in both Vietnamese and English. Despite being secure by design and located in a room itself controlled by an electronic key card, security of valuables would be further enhanced if the safety box was actually bolted to the wall and not free to move about our room.

review.comment_positive: Great option on Hai Phong. it's got personality and style. the staff really tried their best. the area around it is quite pretty and great location. was perfect place to prepare for our wedding, the team of bridesmaids and my bride made full use of the suite to get ready. also perfect place to unwind after the big event. we booked extra nights ad hoc because we enjoyed it.
